citation: Proclamation under the Roads and Jetties Act 1935 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Roads and Jetties Act 1935

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 7 of the Roads and Jetties Act 1935 â€“

        (a) amend the proclamation notified in the Gazette as Statutory Rules 1970, No. 67 by inserting into Part II of the Second Schedule to that proclamation after the item relating to the Meander Valley Secondary Road the following item:
        Mud Walls Secondary Road  From Colebrook Main Road at the junction with Tea Tree Secondary Road to the junction with the Midland Highway via Campania and Colebrook  38.41 km
                                                                                                                                                                                     
        
            (b) declare that this proclamation takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.
    15 September 2003

    G. S. M. Green

    Governor

    By His Excellency's Command,

    J. G. Cox

    Minister for Infrastructure

    Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

    Notified in the Gazette on 24 September 2003

    This proclamation is administered in the Department of Infrastructure, Energy and Resources.
